class storm[source]

storm(filename='', ds=None, anomaly=True, **kwargs)

The constructor for storm track class. Initialize a storm instance.

If filename is given, try to load it directly. Arguments to the load function can be passed as key=value argument.

Parameters 

filename : string
    Datapath + filename.nc
ds : dataset
    xarray dataset
anomaly: bool
    calculates anomaly in time
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

storm.read(filename, **kwargs)

Reads a file into a xarray dataset.

Parameters 

filename : string
    Valid path + filename
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

storm.read_xarray[source]

storm.read_xarray(ds)

Read an existing xarray data set.

Parameter: 

ds: data set
    Valid xarray data set.
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

storm.set_up[source]

storm.set_up(time_name=None, longitude_name=None, latitude_name=None, force=False, write=True)

Prepares the dataset for storm tracking. Does consistency checks and tests if all required information is available. Sets (automatically or manually) internal variables and dimensions.

Parameters 

time_name : string, optional
    Name of time dimension. The default is None.
longitude_name : string, optional
    Name of longitude dimension. The default is None.
latitude_name : string, optional
    Name of latitude dimension. The default is None.
force=False: bool, optional
    Skip some consistency checks.
write=True: bool, optional
    Print name of dimensions.

Returns 

None.
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

storm._get_resolution(dim, force=False)

set spatial (lat/lon) and temporal (time) resolution
